amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the "Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the "Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Nolan.
